free_text.Bibliographie et matériel: ALEXANDER, C., [i]A Pattern Language[/i]. BALMOND,C., [i]Number 9[/i]. COHEN, P.S., [i]Contested Symmetries and Other Predicaments in Architecture[/i]. D'ARCY THOMPSON, T., [i]On growth and form[/i]. DETAIL Praxis - Digitale Prozesse. GRAMAZIO, F. & KOHLER, M., [i]Digital Materiality in Architecture[/i]. HAUER, E., [i]Continua[/i]. KOLAREVIC, B., [i]Manufacturing Material Effects[/i]. LE MONITEUR, [i]Made Of...: Materials Sourcebook for Architecture and Design[/i]. LYNN, G., [i]Folds, Bodies and Blobs[/i]. LYNN, G., [i]Greg Lynn Form[/i]. POTTMANN, H., ASPERL, A., HOFER, M., KILIAN, A., [i]Architectural Geometry[/i]. MOUSSAVI, F. & KUBO, M., [i]The Function of Ornament, Farshid Moussavi and Michael Kubo[/i]. OXMAN, R., [i]The New Structuralism: Design, Engineering and Architectural Technologies[/i]. REISER, J., [i]Atlas of Novel Tectonics[/i]. SILVER, M., [i]AD: Programming Cultures[/i]. SCHUMACHER, P., [i]Autopoiesis of Architecture[/i].
